title: Question:
author: roksana.hee
content: A few months ago, I got 2 texts from a Business Profile Buyer of Fiverr.com, whose name is anthoy99 & steven45677, they offer to do a youtube video promotion, and for that, I feel interested but a few times later anthoy99 threat me to harm my Fiverr profile. I report both of them to the fiverr.com support team but the team advised me to report them just.Please see the below screenshot...1. https://img001.prntscr.com/file/img001/RtFq0uKIT_mV7pkIDqrUxA.png2. https://img001.prntscr.com/file/img001/3zZ3G6BRStCGKKwOMyvKdA.png3. https://img001.prntscr.com/file/img001/ERU-rsS4SSyVkBNvSp2t7w.png4. https://img001.prntscr.com/file/img001/6GUwXubDQoSZ2xQfkVaFGA.png5. https://img001.prntscr.com/file/img001/GjtB1_uwQmCdKCZXuHwzZQ.png6. https://img001.prntscr.com/file/img001/jFq55gzWS4aOGNOQOlO1Gg.png7. https://img001.prntscr.com/file/img001/D3ExIaO7T--_20wRtDkI-A.png8. https://img001.prntscr.com/file/img001/sJFDNR-7TmeDdY-HNuyIZA.pngFiverr's advice:9. https://img001.prntscr.com/file/img001/3i86BCsySWKlc8GPXAKEEQ.png10. https://img001.prntscr.com/file/img001/fQuFOJGLScKWXEXsXFXW2w.png

comments.author: roksana.hee
comments.body: They treated me to vanish my profile. Can you help me to avoid this type of text from a business profile on Fiverr?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I don't exactly understand what was going on with the chats you posted, especially the last 4 of them when they were typing in some language I can not understand.You said they threatened to make your profile disappear?Best thing you would do is follow the advice from fiverr team. Report and block them.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Why did they want to know your fb and insta accounts so bad? I hope you didn't give it to them!Don't worry. They can't close your account or anything like that (a business account doesn't mean much, you can get one for free).The worst thing someone can do to harm your account is to leave you a low rating but he can't do that unless you have completed the order.Just report/block them as the support team suggested.

comments.author: roksana.hee
comments.body: Quote from: khaled0111 on February 13, 2023, 09:43:38 PMWhy did they want to know your fb and insta accounts so bad?They want to get an issue to report, I did understand it before.Quote from: khaled0111 on February 13, 2023, 09:43:38 PM I hope you didn't give it to them!Yes, Bro, I can't give them any information about myself. Because it's the violation of Fiverr.com

comments.author: roksana.hee
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on February 13, 2023, 09:16:11 PMYou said they threatened to make your profile disappear?They're trying to report my Fiverr account but I can't work there on Fiverr.com,Yes, I got the advice from Fiverr Support, then I block them direct from my inbox.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: roksana.hee on February 13, 2023, 06:19:45 AMA few months ago, I got 2 texts from a Business Profile Buyer of Fiverr.com, whose name is anthoy99 & steven45677, they offer to do a youtube video promotion, and for that, I feel interested but a few times later anthoy99 threat me to harm my Fiverr profile. I report both of them to the fiverr.com support team but the team advised me to report them just.These are scammers, as there are many buyers who have a business profile and put stock photos and message sellers in order for them to do something for them and they will pay them, but as you can see they are trying to keep you away from Fiver and drag you to Facebook or any social media platform so that you may send them the service on FB, Twitter. etc without paying you on Fiver, where Fiver is the mediator between the seller and the buyer to guarantee the rights, they want you to get out of the Fiver escrow and work for free, or they may try to hack you and steal your Fiver account, so anyone who communicates with you to deal outside of Fiver I recommend blocking and reporting his account and not paying attention to threats of these idiots, they can't harm your Fiver account because you didn't violate the platform's policies.
